 Cluster tags using the DLBG interfaces.

Detailed Description

Class BoxGeneratorStrategy is an abstract base class that defines a Strategy pattern interface for operations to build boxes that cover a collection of tagged cells on a single AMR patch hierarchy level.

See also:
hier::PatchLevel

) [pure virtual]

Cluster tags using the DLBG interfaces.

Parameters:
tag_to_new_width [in] Width that tag_to_new should have. If implementation does not provide this width for tag_to_new, then it should set the width to zero.
[out] new_box_level BoxLevel containing Boxes of clustered tagged cells.
[out] tag_to_new Connector from the tagged to the new BoxLevels.
[in] tag_level Tagged PatchLevel.
[in] tag_data_index Index of PatchData used to denote tagging.
[in] tag_val Value of PatchData indicating a tagged cell.
[in] bound_boxes Collection of Boxes describing the bounding box of each block in the tag level.
[in] min_box Smallest box size resulting from clustering.
[in] tag_to_new_width Width of tag_to_new Connector.

Implemented in SAMRAI::mesh::BergerRigoutsos, and SAMRAI::mesh::TileClustering.
